title: Epic: LLVM backend and Zig runtime
body:
Implement LLVM backend for GRIN. LLVM generates native code + Wasm. Runtime system written in Zig. Calling convention TBD (eval/apply, push/enter, or CPS — needs research).

**Key decisions**: #22, #23 in DESIGN.md
**Sub-tasks to split later**: GRIN→LLVM IR, calling convention research, Zig runtime (entry point, thunk eval, heap alloc, basic I/O)
